name: BiKase Handy Andy 6 Smartphone Case
description: Keep your hands on the bars, your eyes on the road, but keep your phone accessible as you ride. A simple Velcro attachment secures it and makes it easy to add and remove.Max phone dimensions are 16.5 x 8.9cm by 2.5cm deep (max depth requires removal of inner spacer).Internal spacer has a sleeve to hold ID, credit card, or a bit of cash.Velcro straps.Touchscreen works through protective window.Reflective logo adds a bit more visibility, which never hurts.2-way zipper allows port usage.Note: iPhone 7, 7+, 8 and 8+ users will fin dtheir home button does not read through the plastic. Add a floating home button to your screen to mitigate this issue.
